mapper.sql: USERID, STATUS, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, TRUENAME, ADDRESS, TEL, MOBILE, EMAIL, REMINDERQUESTION, REMINDERANSWER, IFPUBMYINFO, APPLYTIME, REGTIME, LOGINTIMES, LOGINTIME, LOGOUTTIME, MSGINTERVAL, VIEWINTERVAL, ATTRIBUTE, CRUSER, CRTIME, PRICE, ISDELETED, PASSWORDLEV, VIEWDOCLEVEL, SUPERVISORID

select
distinct
from wcmuser
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into wcmuser (USERID, STATUS, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, TRUENAME, ADDRESS, TEL, MOBILE, EMAIL, REMINDERQUESTION, REMINDERANSWER, IFPUBMYINFO, APPLYTIME, REGTIME, LOGINTIMES, LOGINTIME, LOGOUTTIME, MSGINTERVAL, VIEWINTERVAL, ATTRIBUTE, CRUSER, CRTIME, PRICE, ISDELETED, PASSWORDLEV, VIEWDOCLEVEL, SUPERVISORID) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reminderquestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reminderanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifpubmyinfo,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logintimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logouttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{msginterval,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{viewinterval,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cruser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{passwordlev,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewdoclevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supervisorid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
